column1: Uchi////Honestly I think this place is overrated. I came here because traffic prevented me from going to Miyagi - best authentic Japanese Sushi restaurant in Houston in my mind. I was hoping for a mind-blowing experience because of all the Yelp reviews and the ravings from my coworkers
column2: but left disappointed. If you are looking for authentic Japanese food
column3: do not come here! It's at most a trendy Japanese-fusion restaurant. Major chefs are non Japanese and sushi/rolls are prepared in a pretty western way.
